Explain why the trajectory might also be described by d2X Year 1 Semester 2 Mathematics 2024-2025 Maths for Physicists 1B Assessed Problem 3 (a) Find the solution of the diﬀerential equation d2y dx2 + dy dx − 2y = 2x2 where y(0) = y′(0) = 0. [5] (b) Find the solution of the diﬀerential equation dy dx + y2 = 2 x2 where y(1) = 1. You may ﬁnd useful the substitution y = 1 u du dx . [5]
